meanings.definition: One of four equal parts of something
meanings.sent1: The pizza was divided into quarters for each of us to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: She cut the sandwich into quarters so that everyone could have a piece.
meanings.sent3: The cake was split into quarters, but I accidentally ate two of them!
meanings.sent4: His heart was broken into quarters, each piece representing a different failed relationship.
meanings.sent5: The garden was divided into quarters, with each section growing a different type of vegetable.

meanings.definition: Living accommodations, especially for military personnel
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were assigned to their respective quarters in the barracks.
meanings.sent2: The general inspected the new military quarters to ensure they were up to standard.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed the cozy dog bed as its own quarters, much to the dog's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The luxurious quarters provided to the officers were a stark contrast to the cramped bunks of the lower ranks.
meanings.sent5: The temporary quarters were set up for the troops during their training exercise in the field.

meanings.definition: A period of three months, especially in financial reporting
meanings.sent1: The company's profits increased steadily over the last two quarters.
meanings.sent2: The first quarter of the year is usually the busiest for our department.
meanings.sent3: She saved up for a vacation over the next two quarters, planning a trip to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The project was completed within the deadline of two quarters, much to the team's relief.
meanings.sent5: The budget for the event was allocated for the next two quarters, ensuring smooth planning and execution.

meanings.definition: The rear part of a ship or aircraft
meanings.sent1: The crew gathered at the quarters of the ship to prepare for departure.
meanings.sent2: The captain stood at the stern, overlooking the quarters of the vessel.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the ship's quarters, enjoying the view of the open sea.
meanings.sent4: The storm hit the quarters of the ship hardest, causing damage to the rear structure.
meanings.sent5: The aircraft's quarters housed the engine, ensuring smooth propulsion during flight.
